label: Startup Investment
description: Investment opportunities and resources for startups.
intents: Learn how to fund a startup

subcategories.label: Venture Capital
subcategories.description: Investment firms that provide funding to startups in exchange for equity.

subcategories.label: Crowdfunding
subcategories.description: Online platforms that allow startups to raise funds from a large number of people.

subcategories.label: Seed Funding
subcategories.description: Early-stage funding for startups to develop their products or services.

subcategories.label: Business Investment
subcategories.description: Investment opportunities for businesses looking to expand or grow.

subcategories.label: Startup Resources
subcategories.description: Resources and services for startups to help them grow and succeed.
